categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Loposa was a female Jedi Master who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire, when she was stationed on the space station Carrick Station.

The Operations Gear Vendor for the Jedi Consular class, Master Loposa was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of Game Update 2.4 on October 1, 2013, along with the other Operations Gear Vendors. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
